data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve a signed receipt from the data collection protocol
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a specific signed receipt (Beleg) that has been stored in the Datenerfassungsprotokoll (data collection protocol). Requires the Registrierkasse UUID and Beleg UUID as path parameters. Returns the complete SignierteBelegdaten object containing the receipt data and cryptographic signature. This operation is read-only and does not modify any state.

data.current_description: Signs a receipt and stores it in the "Datenerfassungsprotokoll".
data.summary_suggestion: Sign and store a receipt in the data collection protocol
data.description_suggestion: Signs a receipt (Beleg) using the Signaturerstellungseinheit and stores it in the Datenerfassungsprotokoll (data collection protocol). Accepts Belegdaten as the request body containing receipt line items, payments, and discounts. Requires the Registrierkasse UUID and Beleg UUID as path parameters. Returns the complete SignierteBelegdaten object with the cryptographic signature and storage confirmation. This operation creates a permanent, tamper-evident record of the transaction.
data.reasoning: Missing summary entirely. Description lacks detail about input structure (Belegdaten), what is returned (SignierteBelegdaten), and the significance of the operation (creates permanent, tamper-evident record). Added context about the signing process and storage implications for RKSV compliance understanding.

data.description_suggestion: Generates and exports the Datenerfassungsprotokoll (DEP) file for the specified Registrierkasse. This file contains all signed receipts and transaction records required for RKSV compliance and audit purposes. Requires the Registrierkasse UUID as a path parameter. Returns the DEP file in the configured export format. This operation is typically used for compliance reporting, audits, or data backup.

data.summary_suggestion: Create closing receipt for cash register
data.description_suggestion: Generates and signs a closing receipt (Abschlussbeleg) for a specific cash register (Registrierkasse) identified by UUID. This operation creates a cryptographically signed closing record that documents the cash register's state at a point in time, required for RKSV compliance. Accepts Abschlussbelegdaten (closing receipt data) in the request body. Returns the signed closing receipt (SignierteBelegdaten) with cryptographic signature. This operation has side effects - it creates a permanent record in the Datenerfassungsprotokoll.
